Performance:
February 1978: The Battle of Dannoura

Production: February 1978

Play: The Battle of Dannoura (壇浦兜軍記)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Torture by Koto (阿古屋琴責 / Akoya kotozeme)

Characters:

Akoya (Yūkun Akoya / 遊君阿古屋)

Shigetada (Chichibuno Shōji Shigetada / 秩父庄司重忠)

Iwanaga (Iwanaga Saemon / 岩永左衛門)

Hanzawa (Hanzawa Rokurō / 榛沢六郎)

Servant (Mizuyakko / 水奴)
